Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

Gist Shortcode

Quote Shortcode

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

class person
{
private:
 int age;
public:
 person(int nAge)
 {
 this->age = nAge;
 }

 bool operator==(const person& ps)
 {
 if (this->age == ps.age)
 {
 return true;
 }
 return false;
 }
};

class Solution {
 // å·¦å³æŒ‡é’ˆ
 public int maxArea(int[] height) {
 // åˆå§‹ï¼šå·¦æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘æœ€å·¦ï¼Œå³æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘æœ€å³
 int left = 0;
 int right = height.length - 1;
 int max = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
 while (left < right) {
 int leftValue = height[left];
 int rightValue = height[right];
 int min = Math.min(leftValue, rightValue);
 // æ›´æ–°ç­”æ¡ˆ
 max = Math.max(min * (right - left), max);
 // å·¦æŒ‡é’ˆå€¼å¤§äºå³æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œåˆ™å³æŒ‡é’ˆå·¦ç§»ï¼Œä¸€ç›´ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°å¤§äºå½“å‰ä½ç½®ï¼Œç„¶åè®¡ç®—å½“å‰å®¹é‡å¹¶æ›´æ–°ç­”æ¡ˆ
 if (height[left] > height[right]) {
 right--;
 while (left < right && height[right] < rightValue) {
 right--;
 }
 } else {
 left++;
 // å·¦æŒ‡é’ˆå€¼å°äºç­‰äºå³æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œåˆ™å·¦æŒ‡é’ˆå³ç§»ï¼Œä¸€ç›´ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°å¤§äºå½“å‰ä½ç½®ï¼Œç„¶åè®¡ç®—å½“å‰å®¹é‡å¹¶æ›´æ–°ç­”æ¡ˆ
 while (left < right && height[left] <= leftValue) {
 left++;
 }
 }
 }
 return max;
 }
}

class Solution {
 /*
 * æ§åˆ¶å˜é‡æ³•
 * 1ã€æ’åº
 * 2ã€å›ºå®šä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œå·¦å³æŒ‡é’ˆç§»åŠ¨ä¸¤ä¸ª
 */
 public List<List<Integer>> threeSum(int[] nums) {
 // æ’åº
 Arrays.sort(nums);
 List<List<Integer>> res = new ArrayList<>();
 for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {
 // å»é‡
 if (i > 0 && nums[i] == nums[i - 1]) {
 continue;
 }
 int left = i + 1;
 int right = nums.length - 1;
 while (left < right) {
 // å¦‚æœæœ€å°çš„å¤§äº0ï¼Œåˆ™å’Œè‚¯å®šå¤§äº0
 if (nums[i] > 0) {
 break;
 }
 int sum = nums[left] + nums[right] + nums[i];
 if (sum == 0) {
 res.add(Arrays.asList(nums[i], nums[left], nums[right]));
 // å»é‡ -2,-1,-1,0,0,1,1,2,2
 while (left < right && nums[left] == nums[left + 1]) {
 left++;
 }
 while (left < right && nums[right] == nums[right - 1]) {
 right--;
 }
 left++;
 right--;
 }
 while (left < right && nums[left] + nums[right] + nums[i] < 0) {
 left++;
 }
 while (left < right && nums[left] + nums[right] + nums[i] > 0) {
 right--;
 }
 }
 }
 return res;
 }
}

class Solution {
 public int removeDuplicates(int[] nums) {
 // å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆ
 int left = 1;
 int right = 1;
 int len = nums.length;
 while (right < len) {
 // å¦‚æœé‡åˆ°é‡å¤å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå·¦æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘é‡å¤ä½ç½®ï¼Œå³æŒ‡é’ˆç»§ç»­å¾€å‰èµ°
 // ä¸é‡å¤ä¹‹åå³æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘çš„å€¼å­˜åˆ°å·¦æŒ‡é’ˆä½ç½®
 if (nums[right] != nums[right - 1]) {
 nums[left++] = nums[right];
 }
 right++;
 }
 // leftæŒ‡å‘çš„å°±æ˜¯æœ€åç¬¬kä¸ªä½ç½®
 return left;
 }
}

class Solution {
 public void wiggleSort(int[] nums) {
 // æ’åº
 Arrays.sort(nums);
 int length = nums.length;
 int[] temp = Arrays.copyOf(nums, length);

 // å·¦å³æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œå°†å…ƒç´ å¡«å…¥æ•°ç»„ä¸­
 // å€’åºäº¤å‰æ’å…¥ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢112233 => 131322
 // å·¦æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘ä¸­é—´
 int left = length % 2 == 0 ? length / 2 - 1 : length / 2;
 // å³æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘ç»“å°¾
 int right = length - 1;
 // å…ˆæ”¾å·¦è¾¹ï¼Œç„¶åæ”¾å³è¾¹
 for (int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
 // å¥‡æ•°ä½ç½®å¡«rightï¼Œå¶æ•°ä½ç½®å¡«left
 nums[i] = temp[(i & 1) == 0 ? left-- : right--];
 }
 }
}

/**
 * Definition for singly-linked list.
 * class ListNode {
 * int val;
 * ListNode next;
 * ListNode(int x) {
 * val = x;
 * next = null;
 * }
 * }
 */
public class Solution {
 public boolean hasCycle(ListNode head) {
 if (head == null) {
 return false;
 }
 ListNode pre = head;
 ListNode next = head;
 while (next != null) {
 pre = pre.next;
 next = next.next;
 if (next != null) {
 next = next.next;
 } else {
 return false;
 }
 if (pre == next) {
 return true;
 }
 }
 return false;
 }
}
